name: Veckto|3600
description:
Hello everyone! 

This is Veckto|3600! This is an arcade space shooter with vector graphics. The game is still in development with GameMaker Studio 2.

The idea is to create a game without sprites for visuals. Instead I will use lines to draw everything on the screen and some not visible sprite as hit boxes.

Controls:

Move: W/A/S/D

Shoot: Left Mouse Click.

Bomb: Right Mouse Click.

(Compatible with Xbox controller)

This DEMO is just a loop and the first boss is not finished. I've been working on this game since the beginning of 2021 but I didn't make much progress.

Thank you for downloading!

Have fun!
